title: How is PES for MCA?
content: I'm considering PES for my MCA? How is this college in terms of MCA placements ?

comments.body:
please don't. Try RV or BMS or Christ. Not PES. At least not for MCA. 
Poor placements, no support from the University at all. Try Christ University

Bro then why this college is giving MCA degrees.. They called me twice that the registration closes today..n..blah.blah.blah..they were somewhat forcing me to book a slot for interview. But I gave some reasons to escape. How come after reaching on this platform I'm hearing the negative aspects of this college, I mean in quora the answers seemed like "paid" One and I saw 2-3 YouTube videos where they were saying "Why you should join PES for MCA ", best in Bengaluru etc. etc.

I've studied here man. I hated every aspect of this place, starting from the fact that we don't get any sort of ".edu" mail even though this is a university, to the fact that companies don't want to hire MCA when they come for placements. 
8/242 is the placement stats of the current year. 
Just join RV or some other college and do yourself a favour. 
MCA here is just a gimmick to get money for the university.
